fileSamples.statement:
forall (x : R) (e : Z),
(bpow (e - 1) <= Rabs x <= bpow e)%R ->
FLX_format x -> FIX_format beta (e - prec) x.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros x e Hx [[xm xe] H1 H2].
rewrite H1, (F2R_prec_normalize beta xm xe e prec).
now eexists.
exact H2.
now rewrite <- H1.

fileSamples.statement: forall x : R, FLX_format x -> generic_format beta FLX_exp x.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros x [[mx ex] H1 H2].
simpl in H2.
rewrite H1.
apply generic_format_F2R.
intros Zmx.
unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
rewrite mag_F2R with (1 := Zmx).
apply Zplus_le_reg_r with (prec - ex)%Z.
ring_simplify.
now apply mag_le_Zpower.

fileSamples.statement: forall x : R, generic_format beta FLX_exp x <-> FLX_format x.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros x.
split.
apply FLX_format_generic.
apply generic_format_FLX.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) : generic_format beta FLX_exp x <-> FLX_format x.
fileSamples.proofString:
split.
apply FLX_format_generic.
apply generic_format_FLX.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) : generic_format beta FLX_exp x -> FLX_format x.
fileSamples.proofString: apply FLX_format_generic.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) : FLX_format x -> generic_format beta FLX_exp x.
fileSamples.proofString: apply generic_format_FLX.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) (Hx : (bpow (e - 1) <= Rabs x <= bpow e)%R) : (FLX_exp e <= FIX_exp (e - prec) e)%Z.
fileSamples.proofString: apply Z.le_refl.

fileSamples.statement: forall x : R, generic_format beta FLX_exp x <-> FLXN_format x.
fileSamples.proofString:
split ; intros H.
now apply FLXN_format_generic.
now apply generic_format_FLXN.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (H : generic_format beta FLX_exp x) : FLXN_format x.
fileSamples.proofString: now apply FLXN_format_generic.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (H : FLXN_format x) : generic_format beta FLX_exp x.
fileSamples.proofString: now apply generic_format_FLXN.

fileSamples.statement: forall n : Z, (n <= FLX_exp n)%Z -> Some n = None.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros n H2; contradict H2.
unfold FLX_exp; unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia.

fileSamples.statement: (n : Z) : ~ (n <= FLX_exp n)%Z.
fileSamples.proofString: unfold FLX_exp; unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia.

fileSamples.statement:
1%R =
(IZR (Ztrunc (1 * bpow (- FLX_exp (mag beta 1)))) *
 bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta 1)))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Rmult_1_l, (mag_unique beta 1 1).
unfold FLX_exp.
rewrite <- IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite Ztrunc_IZR, IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite <- bpow_plus.
now replace (_ + _)%Z with Z0 by ring.
rewrite Rabs_R1; simpl; split; [now right|].
unfold Z.pow_pos; simpl; rewrite Zmult_1_r; apply IZR_lt.
assert (H := Zle_bool_imp_le _ _ (radix_prop beta)); lia.

fileSamples.statement: 1%R = (IZR (Ztrunc (bpow (- FLX_exp 1))) * bpow (FLX_exp 1))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold FLX_exp.
rewrite <- IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite Ztrunc_IZR, IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite <- bpow_plus.
now replace (_ + _)%Z with Z0 by ring.

fileSamples.statement: 1%R = (IZR (Ztrunc (bpow (- (1 - prec)))) * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite <- IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite Ztrunc_IZR, IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite <- bpow_plus.
now replace (_ + _)%Z with Z0 by ring.

fileSamples.statement: 1%R = (IZR (Ztrunc (IZR (beta ^ (- (1 - prec))))) * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Ztrunc_IZR, IZR_Zpower; [|unfold Prec_gt_0 in prec_gt_0_; lia].
rewrite <- bpow_plus.
now replace (_ + _)%Z with Z0 by ring.

fileSamples.statement: 1%R = (bpow (- (1 - prec)) * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite <- bpow_plus.
now replace (_ + _)%Z with Z0 by ring.

fileSamples.statement: 1%R = bpow (- (1 - prec) + (1 - prec)).
fileSamples.proofString: now replace (_ + _)%Z with Z0 by ring.

fileSamples.statement: (bpow (1 - 1) <= Rabs 1 < bpow 1)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Rabs_R1; simpl; split; [now right|].
unfold Z.pow_pos; simpl; rewrite Zmult_1_r; apply IZR_lt.
assert (H := Zle_bool_imp_le _ _ (radix_prop beta)); lia.

fileSamples.statement: (1 < IZR (Z.pow_pos beta 1))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Z.pow_pos; simpl; rewrite Zmult_1_r; apply IZR_lt.
assert (H := Zle_bool_imp_le _ _ (radix_prop beta)); lia.

fileSamples.statement: (1 < beta)%Z.
fileSamples.proofString: assert (H := Zle_bool_imp_le _ _ (radix_prop beta)); lia.

fileSamples.statement:
match negligible_exp FLX_exp with
| Some n => bpow (FLX_exp n)
| None => 0%R
end = 0%R.
fileSamples.proofString: rewrite negligible_exp_FLX; easy.

fileSamples.statement: bpow (mag beta 1 - prec) = bpow (- prec + 1).
fileSamples.proofString: rewrite mag_1; f_equal; ring.

fileSamples.statement: (rnd : R -> Z) (Hr : Valid_rnd rnd) (x : R) : round beta FLX_exp rnd x = 0%R -> x = 0%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
apply eq_0_round_0_negligible_exp; try assumption.
apply FLX_exp_valid.
apply negligible_exp_FLX.

fileSamples.statement: (rnd : R -> Z) (Hr : Valid_rnd rnd) (x : R) : Valid_exp FLX_exp.
fileSamples.proofString: apply FLX_exp_valid.

fileSamples.statement: (rnd : R -> Z) (Hr : Valid_rnd rnd) (x : R) : negligible_exp FLX_exp = None.
fileSamples.proofString: apply negligible_exp_FLX.

fileSamples.statement: (rnd : R -> Z) (Hr : Valid_rnd rnd) (x : R) (Hx : (0 < x)%R) : (0 <= x)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: now apply Rlt_le.

fileSamples.statement: (rnd : R -> Z) (Hr : Valid_rnd rnd) (x : R) (Hx : (0 < x)%R) (H : 0%R = round beta FLX_exp rnd x) : x <> 0%R.
fileSamples.proofString: now apply Rgt_not_eq.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x = 0%R) : (ulp beta FLX_exp x <= Rabs x * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Hx, ulp_FLX_0, Rabs_R0.
right; ring.
right; ring.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (ulp beta FLX_exp x <= Rabs x * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite ulp_neq_0; try exact Hx.
unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
replace (mag beta x - prec)%Z with ((mag beta x - 1) + (1-prec))%Z by ring.
rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
now apply bpow_mag_le.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (bpow (cexp beta FLX_exp x) <= Rabs x * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
replace (mag beta x - prec)%Z with ((mag beta x - 1) + (1-prec))%Z by ring.
rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
now apply bpow_mag_le.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (bpow (mag beta x - prec) <= Rabs x * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
replace (mag beta x - prec)%Z with ((mag beta x - 1) + (1-prec))%Z by ring.
rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
now apply bpow_mag_le.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (bpow (mag beta x - 1 + (1 - prec)) <= Rabs x * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
now apply bpow_mag_le.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (bpow (mag beta x - 1) * bpow (1 - prec) <= Rabs x * bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
now apply bpow_mag_le.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (0 <= bpow (1 - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString: apply bpow_ge_0.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (bpow (mag beta x - 1) <= Rabs x)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: now apply bpow_mag_le.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x = 0%R) : (Rabs x * bpow (- prec) <= ulp beta FLX_exp x)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Hx, ulp_FLX_0, Rabs_R0.
right; ring.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x = 0%R) : (0 * bpow (- prec) <= 0)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: right; ring.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (Rabs x * bpow (- prec) <= ulp beta FLX_exp x)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite ulp_neq_0; try exact Hx.
unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
unfold Zminus; rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
left; now apply bpow_mag_gt.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (Rabs x * bpow (- prec) <= bpow (cexp beta FLX_exp x))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
unfold Zminus; rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
left; now apply bpow_mag_gt.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (Rabs x * bpow (- prec) <= bpow (mag beta x - prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Zminus; rewrite bpow_plus.
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
left; now apply bpow_mag_gt.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (Rabs x * bpow (- prec) <= bpow (mag beta x) * bpow (- prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
apply Rmult_le_compat_r.
apply bpow_ge_0.
left; now apply bpow_mag_gt.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (0 <= bpow (- prec))%R.
fileSamples.proofString: apply bpow_ge_0.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (Rabs x <= bpow (mag beta x))%R.
fileSamples.proofString: left; now apply bpow_mag_gt.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) : ulp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e) = (ulp beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct (Req_dec x 0) as [Hx|Hx].
unfold ulp.
now rewrite !Req_bool_true, negligible_exp_FLX; rewrite ?Hx, ?Rmult_0_l.
unfold ulp; rewrite Req_bool_false;  [|now intro H; apply Hx, (Rmult_eq_reg_r (bpow e));    [rewrite Rmult_0_l|apply Rgt_not_eq, Rlt_gt, bpow_gt_0]].
rewrite (Req_bool_false _ _ Hx), <- bpow_plus; f_equal; unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
now rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [ring|].

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) (Hx : x = 0%R) : ulp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e) = (ulp beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold ulp.
now rewrite !Req_bool_true, negligible_exp_FLX; rewrite ?Hx, ?Rmult_0_l.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Hx : x = 0%R) : (if Req_bool (x * bpow e) 0
 then
  match negligible_exp FLX_exp with
  | Some n => bpow (FLX_exp n)
  | None => 0%R
  end
 else bpow (cexp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e))) =
((if Req_bool x 0
  then
   match negligible_exp FLX_exp with
   | Some n => bpow (FLX_exp n)
   | None => 0
   end
  else bpow (cexp beta FLX_exp x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: now rewrite !Req_bool_true, negligible_exp_FLX; rewrite ?Hx, ?Rmult_0_l.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : ulp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e) = (ulp beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold ulp; rewrite Req_bool_false;  [|now intro H; apply Hx, (Rmult_eq_reg_r (bpow e));    [rewrite Rmult_0_l|apply Rgt_not_eq, Rlt_gt, bpow_gt_0]].
rewrite (Req_bool_false _ _ Hx), <- bpow_plus; f_equal; unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
now rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [ring|].

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : bpow (cexp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e)) =
((if Req_bool x 0
  then
   match negligible_exp FLX_exp with
   | Some n => bpow (FLX_exp n)
   | None => 0
   end
  else bpow (cexp beta FLX_exp x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (Req_bool_false _ _ Hx), <- bpow_plus; f_equal; unfold cexp, FLX_exp.
now rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [ring|].

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) (Hx : x <> 0%R) : (mag beta (x * bpow e) - prec)%Z = (mag beta x - prec + e)%Z.
fileSamples.proofString: now rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [ring|].

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) : succ beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e) = (succ beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct (Rle_or_lt 0 x) as [Px|Nx].
rewrite succ_eq_pos; [|now apply Rmult_le_pos, bpow_ge_0].
rewrite (succ_eq_pos _ _ _ Px).
now rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r; f_equal; apply ulp_FLX_exact_shift.
unfold succ.
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|assert (H := bpow_gt_0 beta e); nra].
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|now simpl].
rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse, <-Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; f_equal.
unfold pred_pos.
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) (Px : (0 <= x)%R) : succ beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e) = (succ beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite succ_eq_pos; [|now apply Rmult_le_pos, bpow_ge_0].
rewrite (succ_eq_pos _ _ _ Px).
now rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r; f_equal; apply ulp_FLX_exact_shift.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Px : (0 <= x)%R) : (x * bpow e + ulp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e))%R =
(succ beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (succ_eq_pos _ _ _ Px).
now rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r; f_equal; apply ulp_FLX_exact_shift.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Px : (0 <= x)%R) : (x * bpow e + ulp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e))%R =
((x + ulp beta FLX_exp x) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: now rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r; f_equal; apply ulp_FLX_exact_shift.

fileSamples.statement: (x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : succ beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e) = (succ beta FLX_exp x * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold succ.
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|assert (H := bpow_gt_0 beta e); nra].
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|now simpl].
rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse, <-Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; f_equal.
unfold pred_pos.
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (if Rle_bool 0 (x * bpow e)
 then (x * bpow e + ulp beta FLX_exp (x * bpow e))%R
 else (- pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- (x * bpow e)))%R) =
((if Rle_bool 0 x
  then x + ulp beta FLX_exp x
  else - pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|assert (H := bpow_gt_0 beta e); nra].
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|now simpl].
rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse, <-Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; f_equal.
unfold pred_pos.
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (- pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- (x * bpow e)))%R =
((if Rle_bool 0 x
  then x + ulp beta FLX_exp x
  else - pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Rle_bool_false; [|now simpl].
rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse, <-Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; f_equal.
unfold pred_pos.
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (- pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- (x * bpow e)))%R =
(- pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- x) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse, <-Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse; f_equal.
unfold pred_pos.
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- x * bpow e) =
(pred_pos beta FLX_exp (- x) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold pred_pos.
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (if Req_bool (- x * bpow e) (bpow (mag beta (- x * bpow e) - 1))
 then (- x * bpow e - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x * bpow e) - 1)))%R
 else (- x * bpow e - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x * bpow e))%R) =
((if Req_bool (- x) (bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  then - x - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  else - x - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite mag_mult_bpow; [|lra].
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (if Req_bool (- x * bpow e) (bpow (mag beta (- x) + e - 1))
 then (- x * bpow e - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) + e - 1)))%R
 else (- x * bpow e - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x * bpow e))%R) =
((if Req_bool (- x) (bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  then - x - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  else - x - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
replace (_ - 1)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)%Z; [|ring]; rewrite bpow_plus.
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (if Req_bool (- x * bpow e) (bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1) * bpow e)
 then (- x * bpow e - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)))%R
 else (- x * bpow e - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x * bpow e))%R) =
((if Req_bool (- x) (bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  then - x - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  else - x - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Req_bool; rewrite Rcompare_mult_r; [|now apply bpow_gt_0].
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (if
  match Rcompare (- x) (bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1)) with
  | Eq => true
  | _ => false
  end
 then (- x * bpow e - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)))%R
 else (- x * bpow e - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x * bpow e))%R) =
((if
   match Rcompare (- x) (bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1)) with
   | Eq => true
   | _ => false
   end
  then - x - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1))
  else - x - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
fold (Req_bool (-x) (bpow (mag beta (-x) - 1))); case Req_bool.
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.
rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (- x * bpow e - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e)))%R =
((- x - bpow (FLX_exp (mag beta (- x) - 1))) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold FLX_exp.
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (- x * bpow e - bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1 + e - prec))%R =
((- x - bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString:
replace (_ - _)%Z with (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e)%Z; [|ring].
rewrite bpow_plus; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (- x * bpow e - bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec + e))%R =
((- x - bpow (mag beta (- x) - 1 - prec)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: rewrite bpow_plus; ring.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : R) (e : Z) (Nx : (x < 0)%R) : (- x * bpow e - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x * bpow e))%R =
((- x - ulp beta FLX_exp (- x)) * bpow e)%R.
fileSamples.proofString: rewrite ulp_FLX_exact_shift; ring.
